column4: trying to compile a kernel and trying to do a make menuconfig but I get an error saying the ncurses libraries aren't installed, but libncurses5 is installed, how do I proceed?
Unity its a livecd designed for forensics, it won't
I need libncurses5-dev but its not on the ubuntu 6.10 install cd :/
libncurses5-dev - Developer's libraries and docs for ncurses
anywhere I can download the package from?
go to system > administration > synaptic package manager, settings>repositories>add>select them all and save
this box is not hooked up the internet yet.. the whole point of recompiling the kernel was to get a certain usb modem to work
so I need to download it somewhere :/
at the bottom their is a link,
